title: FieldCacheRangeFilter missing from MIGRATE.html
description:
Hi,

i am searching the FieldCacheRangeFilter - its not mentioned in the https://lucene.apache.org/core/5_0_0/MIGRATE.html document and not mentioned in the Changelog  - where to find this one and if it is gone, is it possible to mention this in the migration guide please and how to cope with it in 5.x?

comments.author: Otis Gospodnetic
comments.content: Please ask on the mailing list.
